courses.title: Beginner Yoga
courses.description: This course introduces the basics of yoga for beginners, focusing on flexibility, breath control, and relaxation.

courses.title: Advanced Weightlifting
courses.description: Take your weightlifting to the next level with our advanced course. Focuses on technique, strength, and endurance.

courses.title: HIIT Training
courses.description: A high-intensity interval training program designed to burn fat and build muscle in a short amount of time.

courses.title: Pilates for Core Strength
courses.description: Strengthen your core with our Pilates program, focusing on stability, posture, and overall body control.

courses.title: Cardio Kickboxing
courses.description: A cardio-focused kickboxing course that combines fun, fitness, and technique for a full-body workout.

courses.title: Bodyweight Bootcamp
courses.description: No equipment necessary! This bootcamp uses your own body weight to improve strength and endurance.

courses.title: Powerlifting Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of powerlifting, focusing on proper form for squats, deadlifts, and bench press.

courses.title: Zumba Dance Fitness
courses.description: Dance your way to fitness with Zumba, a fun and energetic class set to upbeat music.

courses.title: Core & Abs Workout
courses.description: A specialized class targeting the core muscles to build strength and improve stability.
